long_description: Protect your laptop and other daily essentials while you make your way to work or school with the STM Ranger Daypack. Spacious internal compartment has a space divider for the included removable laptop sleeve; laptop sleeve measures 14.3 x 9.8 x 0.9 in. to fit most 15 in. laptops. Integrated iPad/tablet pocket is lined with soft material to protect the screen. External organizer pocket has spots for pens, keys, cords, cables and other accessories. Adjustable waist and sternum straps let you fine-tune the fit for comfortable carrying. Drawstring and clip closure secure your items. Closeout.
short_description: Protect your laptop and other daily essentials while you make your way to work or school with the STM Ranger Daypack.
